00003 void printDebugMessage(char* fmt, ...)
00004 {
00005         if (getDebugMode() == 1)
00006         {
00007                 static char buf [2096]; //Maximum size to be printed is 1024 chars.
00008                 va_list args;
00009 
00010                 int i;
00011          
00012                 va_start(args, fmt);
00013 
00014                 i = vsprintf(buf,fmt,args);
00015 
00016                 va_end(args);
00017 
00018                 buf[i] = '\0';
00019 
00020                 prints(buf);
00021         }
00022 }
